title: CLDF dataset derived from Barrientos et al.'s "NorthPeruLex - A Lexical Dataset of Small Language Families and Isolates from Northern Peru (forthcoming).
citation: Barrientos, Carlos and Blum, Frederic and Ingunza, Adriano and Gonzales, Rosa and Pe√±a, Jaime. Forthcoming. NorthPeruLex - A Lexical Dataset of Small Language Families and Isolates from Northern Peru.
description: This dataset brings together lexical data from isolates and small language families from northern Peru to investigate their historic relations.
